_sText:
Map in developing state, no known bugs or issues. Contains many different areas to explore, buttons, lifts, explosions, hot steam etc. I've tested this version with ~30 players and it plays really good, don't know about 64. It is big enough, that's for sure, but there may be camping spots lacking.
Good to know:
- When there are at least 30 players an extra area opens up in the underground base. The energy barrier there can be passed by CT's only
- There is a vent that fills the pipe section with hot steam damaging all those campers down there
- You can shut down the reactor with a button in the small control room. Once shut down, the energy barrier at the pipe section vanishes

**Changelog**
b4: - Fixed the visibility bug (at the gate sealing the extra area)
